powerSourceObject.label: Power source object ID
powerSourceObject.help: Select the ioBroker state containing power data (usually from Shelly energy meter)

pollingInterval.label: Polling interval (ms)
pollingInterval.help: How often to check the power data in milliseconds

inverters.label: Inverters
inverters.help: Configure multiple inverters for power control

items.label: Max power (W)
items.help: Maximum power limit for this inverter

feedInThreshold.label: Inverter limit change threshold (W)

targetFeedIn.label: Maximum grid export (W)
